resources.string: This quick tutorial will help you get started with PineTask.\n\nYou can view it again at any time by choosing "Help" from the side menu.
Open the side menu and choose \"Manage Lists\". Then, click \"+\" and enter a name.
To add an item, click \"+\" and enter a name. To delete an item, click its \"...\" button and choose \"Delete\".
To claim an item, click its hand icon (\“I’ll get this one!\”). It will then show your initials on it. To unclaim an item, click its \"...\" button and choose \"Unclaim\".
To complete an item, click its checkmark icon. To un-complete an item, click its \"...\" button and choose \"Uncomplete\".
Allow others to access your list by sending them an invite link. Go to the \"Members\" tab, click \"+\", select the people to invite, and click the send button.
Open the side menu and choose \"Manage Lists\". Click the pencil icon to rename a list, or the trash icon to delete a list.
Click on the \"Chat\" tab, type a message, and hit send. Each list has its own chat conversation between everyone the list has been shared with.
To permanently delete completed items, click \"...\" on the top menu bar and choose \"Purge Completed Items\".
To share your lists or be able to access them later, you\'ll need to create an account. Or, you can just try the app now and sign up later.
What is your name? Others will see this when you share lists with them, and your initials will show on chat messages and list items you claim.
Do you really want to delete the list \'%1$s\'?
No network connection. Please try again later.
Do you really want to revoke access to the list \'%1$s\' for member %2$s?
Do you really want to delete all completed items in the list \'%1$s\'?
Error getting list of completed items.
Error accepting invite. See log for details.
You\'ve been granted access to the list \'%1$s\'.
Sorry, this invitation has already been used. Please ask the list owner to send you a new invitation.
The current list was deleted. Will display first available list \'%s\'.
No lists found.\nPlease use the \'add\' button to create one.
No items found.\nPlease use the \'add\' button to create one.
Please create your first list by entering a list name below
You have not yet completed account setup. Create a login account to make sure you can access your lists later.
